Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Albany
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento and Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Albany.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Western, Division, Damen and North Avenue, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Western, Division, Damen, then resume their normal route on North Avenue, due to street blockage near North Avenue/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
